title: Spaghetti Carbonara
preparationSteps: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta with black pepper until crispy.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and mix with grated pecorino and parmesan cheese.
Drain the spaghetti and mix quickly with the egg and cheese mixture.
Add the pancetta and mix well. Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
preparationSteps: Chop the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a pan and add minced garlic.
Add vegetables to the pan and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir well.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Classic Brownies
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt the chocolate and butter together.
Whisk the eggs and sugar until light and fluffy.
Combine the chocolate mixture with the egg mixture.
Fold in the flour, cocoa powder, and vanilla extract.
Pour into a baking tray and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Let cool before cutting into squares.

title: Chicken Curry
preparationSteps: Cut the chicken into pieces and season with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions and garlic.
Add the chicken and curry powder, cook until chicken is browned.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

title: Lemon Drizzle Cake
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well.
Fold in flour and lemon zest.
Pour the mixture into a greased loaf tin and bake for 45-50 minutes.
Mix lemon juice with icing sugar and drizzle over the cake while still warm.
